title: Increasing tropospheric GHGs cause climate change

content.question: Global climate change occurs because increasing concentrations of greenhouse gases in

choices.label: the troposphere absorb outgoing IR radiation
the stratosphere absorb outgoing IR radiation
the troposphere absorb incoming UV radiation
the stratosphere absorb incoming UV radiation
neither the troposphere nor the stratosphere absorb incoming UV radiation

content.answer: the troposphere absorb outgoing IR radiation

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
